attributes.action: Set temperature regulations in places of work and education
attributes.additional_details: unsure what this box is for
attributes.background: Set a minimum and maximum temperature of which people should be allowed to take a day off if the temperature exceeds these regulations

rejection.details:
The Workplace (Health, Safety and Welfare) Regulations 1992, which apply to all workplaces, including schools, set out minimum temperature requirements. They require that temperatures shall be “reasonable”, defined as "normally at least 16°C" (60°F).

If you would like a change to this temperature, you could start a new petition about that.
